Binding Strike.name: Binding Strike
Binding Strike.flavor: Your strike binds the enemy’s mind with psionic chains.
Binding Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Perfect Prison.name: Perfect Prison
Perfect Prison.flavor: Your foe’s thoughts collapse under the terrifying weight of your attack.
Perfect Prison.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).
Perfect Prison.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Dazed creatures cannot leave the zone. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Executioner's Summons.name: Executioner's Summons
Executioner's Summons.flavor: With your enemy pinned down, you call forth the executioner to give it a quick end.
Executioner's Summons.requirement: You must be adjacent to an immobilized enemy.
Executioner's Summons.effect: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to an immobilized enemy adjacent to you. Until the end of your next turn, the target gains +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that enemy and a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Wisdom modifier.
